org.hibernate.jmx

Interface HibernateServiceMBean

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HibernateService
    Deprecated. 
    See HHH-6190 for details

    @Deprecated
public interface HibernateServiceMBean
    Hibernate JMX Management API
    See Also:
    HibernateService
